text: Andrei Rublev () is a 1966 Soviet drama movie directed by Andrei Tarkovsky.Рублев как символ. Объявлена программа XXX кинофестиваля «Окно в Европу» It stars Anatoly Solonitsyn, Ivan Lapikov, and Nikolai Grinko. ==Actors== * Anatoly Solonitsyn – Andrei Rublev * Ivan Lapikov – Kirill * Nikolai Grinko – Daniil Chyorny * Nikolai Sergeyev – Theophanes the Greek * Irma Raush * Nikolai Burlyayev – Boriska == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1966 drama movies Category:1960s biographical movies Category:1960s historical movies Category:Movies set in the 15th century Category:Movies directed by Andrei Tarkovsky Category:Movies set in Russia Category:Movies set in Moscow Category:Movies about censorship Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Andrei Rublev (movie)
